newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Kerry Prop to sell flats in Eastern HK.
newsitem.headline: Kerry Prop to sell flats in Eastern HK.

text.p: Kerry Properties Ltd said on Wednesday it will put on sale its Heng Fa Villa residential property in Hong Kong's Chai Wan district on March 6.
"We initially plan to sell five units and may raise the number depending on the market response," a company spokesperson told Reuters.
Kerry owned 30 residential units in the villa with an average area of about 13,000 square feet each. The price tag was preliminarily set at an average HK$10,000 per sq ft, she said.
The development completed in 1990 has a total of 56 units in four blocks.
Kerry owned block C and D, and two units in other blocks and the remainder were held by individual investors and users.
Hong Kong Landpower is the agen, the spokesperson said.
